name: Easier World Events
description: Adds cube recipes for easier access to Uber Tristram and Uber Diablo. A Full Rejuvenation Potion creates the three keys to open a Pandemonium Portal. An amulet creates the three ingredients to open a Pandemonium Finale Portal. A ring creates a Stone of Jordan. Put any ring into the cube and transform. You will get back that ring plus a Stone of Jordan. Sell the Stone of Jordan to any vendor to let Uber Diablo spawn at the location of the next superunique you see (e.g. Rakanishu or Bischibosch).
author: erSch

config.name: Item to use to open a Pandemonium Portal

config.description: You can chose an item other than a Ring Potion to use in the recipe instead.
